about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, my name is Jovanka Tangkilisan, but my close friends usually call me Queen. I am currently a student at Klabat University, majoring in Informatics. In addition to being a student, I also work as a ZIN (Zumba Instructor Network) member and a dancer.
